channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Treasury yields drop after Bessent picked for Treasury
item.description: Bond yields dropped on Monday on hopes that President-elect Donald Trump’s pick of Scott Bessent to be Treasury secretary will help lower budget defic...

item.title: What's Flying Higher Than Bitcoin? The Software Company Buying Up Bitcoin
item.description: MicroStrategy shares are a more popular bitcoin play than the cryptocurrency itself for many individual investors.

item.title: Eurozone Bond Yields Trim Declines After German Ifo Data
item.description: Eurozone government bond yields pared losses after the expectations element of the German Ifo sentiment survey came in slightly above forecasts.

item.title: ‘I don’t want the government involved in my affairs’: My husband lists me as his beneficiary. We don’t have children. Do we need a will?
item.description: “My concern is that there would be some involvement by the state that would cost me.”

item.title: Scott Bessent’s hedge fund has seen up-and-down returns
item.description: Key Square Group, the hedge fund started by Scott Bessent in 2015, has seen its assets under management drop sharply over the past six years on the ba...

item.title: Inflation was only the ‘breaking point’ that led to Trump’s win. Here’s what voters were really mad about, economist says.
item.description: In a TikTok video, one labor economist argues that price increases only amplified a decades-long problem. Here’s the real reason Americans are so mad ...

item.title: Dollar's Dip After Bessent Appointment is Likely Temporary
item.description: The dollar weakened after Donald Trump nominated hedge-fund manager Scott Bessent as Treasury Secretary, but MUFG said the currency should soon resume...

item.title: Backlash Against Chinese Steel Gives Preview of Trump Trade Tensions
item.description: China is exporting its surplus steel at record levels, but importers are getting fed up.

item.title: Concrete-Maker Quikrete Strikes $9.2 Billion Deal for Summit Materials
item.description: The combination would create a behemoth producer of construction materials in North America.

item.title: How Apple could be an AI winner, says one venture-capital investor active in the sector
item.description: Apple has done research to run large language models with limited memory.
